Index.title: Hackathon
Index.description: Let's boost the collaboration between developers and designers to solve real life problems with innovative interactions.
Index.no spam: We will keep you up to date without any spam. We promise!
Index.volunteer description: Organizing such a great event is not easy. We need your help to make it happen! All skills (e.g. graphical design, funding, social medias, etc.) are welcome!
Index.volunteer benefit: As a volunteer, you will be part of the organization team and meet a lot of people in the Dev & Design community.
Index.sponsor description: Organizing such a great event is not easy. We need your help to make it happen! As a sponsor, you have different ways to help us (financial, in-kind, media, community).
Index.sponsor benefit: In exchange, we will communicate about you at every steps of the event. It is a great opportunity to promote your products or services. It is also a great way to accelerate your recruitment and highlight your open positions.

subscribeAnswer.success: Your email was successfully added to our mailing list.
subscribeAnswer.error: An error happened while adding your email to our mailing list.
